title: To Be With You
lyrics:
[intro] | (Am)  (C) | (Am)  (C) | (Am)  (C) | (A#)  (G) |
 
(Am) Hold on little (C)girl (F)show me what he’s (C)done to you

When (F)it's through its (C)through (F)fate will twist the (C)both of you
So (A#)come on baby come on over (G)let me be the one to show you

(C)Deep inside I (F)hope you (G)feel it (C)too

(C)Just to be the (F)next to (G)be with (C)you
